## MessageBuilder.createHTTPHeadersFromMessage() method

Create HTTP Headers from a message.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createHTTPHeadersFromMessage(message: Message, contentType?: string): HeadersInit;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  message | [Message](./foundation-comms.message.md) | The message. |
|  contentType | string | _(Optional)_ Optional content-type, defaults to <code>application/json; charset=UTF-8</code>. |

**Returns:**

HeadersInit

The headers.
